SEARCH

Class Patient

java.lang.Object
User
Patient
public class Patient extends User
Represents a Patient with functionalities such as managing appointments, viewing medical records, and updating personal information. This class interacts with various controllers to perform operations.

      public static Patient getPatient(String patientID, IOHandler handler)
      Factory method to retrieve a Patient instance based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The patient's unique identifier.
      handler - The handler for CSV operations.
      Returns:
      A Patient instance or null if the patient is not found.
